001/**
002 * This controller provides functionality for updating and adding new items to the menu.
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import java.sql.Connection;
008import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
009import java.sql.ResultSet;
010
011import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
012
013import java.sql.*;
014import src.database.dbConnect;
015import src.model.employee;
016
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018
019import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
020import javafx.fxml.FXML;
021import javafx.scene.Scene;
022import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
023
024import javafx.stage.Window;
025import javafx.animation.PauseTransition;
026import javafx.stage.Popup;
027import javafx.util.Duration;
028import javafx.scene.Node;
029import javafx.scene.control.Label;
030
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034import src.model.product;
035
036
037public class add_menu_item_controller {
038    /** Text field for the name of the item to be added */
039    @FXML
040    private TextField item_name_field;
041
042    /** Text field for the id of the item */
043    @FXML
044    private TextField item_id_field;
045
046    /** Text field for the price of the item */
047    @FXML
048    private TextField price_field;
049
050    /** Text field for the first ingredient of the item */
051    @FXML
052    private TextField ing1_field;
053
054    /** Text field for the second ingredient of the item */
055    @FXML
056    private TextField ing2_field;
057    
058    /** Text field for the third ingredient of the item */
059    @FXML
060    private TextField ing3_field;
061    
062    /** Text field for the fourth ingredient of the item */
063    @FXML
064    private TextField ing4_field;
065    
066    /** Text field for the fifth ingredient of the item */
067    @FXML
068    private TextField ing5_field;
069
070    /** 
071     * This function handles adding a new item to the menu and updated the price of a pre-existing item
072     * @param event - Input trigger when the manager clicks enter after filling out the information in the above text fields
073     */
074    @FXML 
075    private void handle_enter(ActionEvent event) {
076        String itemName = item_name_field.getText() == null ? "" : item_name_field.getText().trim();
077        String itemId = item_id_field.getText() == null ? "" : item_id_field.getText().trim();
078        String itemPrice = price_field.getText() == null ? "" : price_field.getText().trim();
079        List<String> ingredients = new ArrayList<>();
080        for(TextField field : List.of(ing1_field, ing2_field, ing3_field, ing4_field, ing5_field)){
081            if(field != null && field.getText() != null && !field.getText().trim().isEmpty()){
082                ingredients.add(field.getText().trim());
083            }
084        }
085
086        if(itemName.isEmpty() || itemId.isEmpty() || itemPrice.isEmpty()) {
087            System.out.println("Ensure item name, ID, and price is entered properly.");
088            return;
089        }
090
091        if(Integer.parseInt(itemId) < 100){
092            System.out.println("Invalid Item ID");
093            return;
094        }
095
096        int emptyCheck = 0;
097        for(String ing : ingredients){
098            if(ing.isEmpty()){ emptyCheck++; }
099        }
100
101        // if topping was entered but has ingredients
102        if(Integer.parseInt(itemId) <= 199 && Integer.parseInt(itemId) >= 100 && emptyCheck != 5){ return; }        
103
104        product newItem = new product(Integer.parseInt(itemId), itemName, Float.parseFloat(itemPrice)); 
105
106        try (Connection conn = dbConnect.getConnection()) {
107            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
108
109            boolean itemExists = false;
110            
111            // CHECK PRODUCT ID EXISTS
112            PreparedStatement checkIdStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT productid FROM products WHERE productid = ?");
113            checkIdStmt.setInt(1, newItem.getId());
114
115            ResultSet rsId = checkIdStmt.executeQuery();
116
117            if (rsId.next()) {// UPDATE PRICE
118                Popup updatePrice = new Popup();
119                Label msg = new Label("The product with the id " + itemId + " exists. Updating price");
120                //have to manually style this in java
121                msg.setStyle(
122                    "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
123                    "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
124                    "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
125                    "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
126                    "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
127                );
128                updatePrice.getContent().add(msg);
129
130                Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
131                Window window = scene.getWindow();
132
133                // Show, then center near bottom
134                updatePrice.show(window);
135                msg.applyCss();
136                msg.layout();
137                //puts it in the middle ish of the screen
138                updatePrice.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
139                updatePrice.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
140
141                //show for 3 seconds
142                PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(4));
143                delay.setOnFinished(e -> updatePrice.hide());
144                delay.play();
145
146                PreparedStatement newPriceStmt = conn.prepareStatement("UPDATE products SET price = ? WHERE productid = ? RETURNING productid");
147                newPriceStmt.setDouble(1, newItem.getPrice());
148                newPriceStmt.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
149
150                ResultSet rsPrice = newPriceStmt.executeQuery();
151
152                if (rsPrice.next()) {
153                    System.out.println("Price updated successfully!");
154                }
155                else{
156                    System.out.println("Could not update price");
157                }
158
159                System.out.println("Product ID already exists, price updated");
160                conn.commit();
161                conn.close();
162                return;
163            }
164
165            PreparedStatement checkNameStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT productname FROM products WHERE productname = ?");
166            checkNameStmt.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
167
168            ResultSet rsName = checkNameStmt.executeQuery();
169
170            if (rsName.next()) {
171                System.out.println("Product name already exists");
172
173                Popup nameExists = new Popup();
174                Label msg = new Label("The product with the name " + itemName + " exists.");
175                
176                msg.setStyle(
177                    "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
178                    "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
179                    "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
180                    "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
181                    "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
182                );
183                nameExists.getContent().add(msg);
184
185                Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
186                Window window = scene.getWindow();
187
188                
189                nameExists.show(window);
190                msg.applyCss();
191                msg.layout();
192                
193                nameExists.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
194                nameExists.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
195
196                PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(4));
197                delay.setOnFinished(e -> nameExists.hide());
198                delay.play();
199
200                itemExists = true;
201                conn.close();
202                return;
203            }
204
205
206            if(itemExists == false){ // item does not exist: can add!
207                if(newItem.getId() >= 200){ // Adds DRINK
208                    if(emptyCheck == 5){
209                        System.out.println("Drink needs ingredients");
210                        return; 
211                    } 
212
213                    // Check Ingredients
214                    List<Integer> ingIds = new ArrayList<>(); 
215                    for(String ingr : ingredients){
216                        if(ingr.isEmpty()) continue;
217
218                        PreparedStatement checkIngStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientname FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientname = ?");
219                        checkIngStmt.setString(1, ingr);
220
221                        ResultSet rsIng = checkIngStmt.executeQuery();
222                        if (rsIng.next()) { // ing exists
223                            int ingredientId = -1;
224                            System.out.println(ingr + "  exists.");
225                            
226                            PreparedStatement getIngId = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientid FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientname = ?");
227                            getIngId.setString(1, ingr);
228
229                            ResultSet rsGotIngId = getIngId.executeQuery();
230                            if(rsGotIngId.next()){ // ing exists
231                                ingredientId = rsGotIngId.getInt("ingredientid");
232                                ingIds.add(ingredientId);
233                            }
234                            else{ // ing ID does NOT exist
235                                System.out.println("Invalid ingredient ID");
236                            }
237                        }
238                        else{ 
239                            System.out.println(ingr + "  does not exist. Please add the new ingredient.");
240
241                            Popup addNewNotif = new Popup();
242                            Label msg = new Label("Please add " + ingr + ".");
243                            //have to manually style this in java
244                            msg.setStyle(
245                                "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
246                                "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
247                                "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
248                                "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
249                                "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
250                            );
251                            addNewNotif.getContent().add(msg);
252
253                            Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
254                            Window window = scene.getWindow();
255
256                            // Show, then center near bottom
257                            addNewNotif.show(window);
258                            msg.applyCss();
259                            msg.layout();
260                            //puts it in the middle ish of the screen
261                            addNewNotif.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
262                            addNewNotif.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
263
264                            //show for 3 seconds
265                            PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(3));
266                            delay.setOnFinished(e -> addNewNotif.hide());
267                            delay.play();
268
269                            conn.rollback();
270                            conn.close();
271                            switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
272                            return;
273                        }
274                    }
275
276                    // Add product information
277                    PreparedStatement insertProduct = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO products (productname, productid, price) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
278                    insertProduct.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
279                    insertProduct.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
280                    insertProduct.setDouble(3, newItem.getPrice());
281
282                    ResultSet rs2 = insertProduct.executeQuery();
283                    if (rs2.next()) {
284                        System.out.println("Drink added sucessfully");
285                    }
286                    else{
287                        System.out.println("Could not add drink to products");
288                        conn.rollback();
289                        conn.close();
290                        return;
291                    }
292
293                    // INSERT INTO DRINKINGREDIENTS
294                    for(Integer id : ingIds){ 
295                            PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO drinkingredients (productid, ingredientid, quantity) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
296                            insertStmt.setInt(1, newItem.getId());
297                            insertStmt.setInt(2, id);
298                            insertStmt.setFloat(3, 1);
299
300                            ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
301                    
302                            if (rs1.next()) {
303                            System.out.println("Ingredient for product added sucessfully");
304                            }
305                            else{
306                                System.out.println("Could not add ingr to drinkingredients");
307                            }
308                    }
309                } // END OF DRINK ADD ON
310                else{
311                    PreparedStatement insertTopping = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO products (productname, productid, price) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
312                    insertTopping.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
313                    insertTopping.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
314                    insertTopping.setDouble(3, newItem.getPrice());
315
316                    ResultSet rs3 = insertTopping.executeQuery();
317
318                    if (rs3.next()) { System.out.println("Topping added sucessfully"); }
319                    else{ System.out.println("Could not add topping to products"); }
320                }
321            }
322            conn.commit();
323            System.out.println("Product added successfully!");
324            conn.close();
325        }
326        catch (SQLException e) {
327            e.printStackTrace();
328        }
329    }
330
331    /**
332     * This handler switches back to the main menu items page
333     * @param event - Input trigger which occurs afrer the user hits the back button
334     */
335    @FXML
336    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
337        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
338    }
339
340    /**
341     * This function clears all the text fields when this page opens
342     */
343    @FXML
344    public void initialize() {
345        // If the page ever re-opens with old text, clear it here
346        if (item_name_field != null) item_name_field.clear();
347        if (item_id_field  != null) item_id_field.clear();
348        if (price_field  != null) price_field.clear();
349        if (ing1_field  != null) ing1_field.clear();
350        if (ing2_field  != null) ing2_field.clear();
351        if (ing3_field  != null) ing3_field.clear();
352        if (ing4_field  != null) ing4_field.clear();
353        if (ing5_field  != null) ing5_field.clear();
354    }
355}
